sentences.en: Aluminum is made from bauxite.
sentences.cn: 铝是从铝土矿中提炼出的.

sentences.en: Aluminum looks heavy but actually it is very light.
sentences.cn: 铝看起来重,实际上却很轻.

sentences.en: Aluminum sleeves were placed around the stems.
sentences.cn: 植株树干用铝制套筒包着.

sentences.en: And she sat and sat on that aluminum throne ever since.
sentences.cn: 自那以后，她就一直坐在那个铝制的宝座上。

sentences.en: As far as balance construction materials are concerned, both aluminum and steel may be used.
sentences.cn: 至于制造天平的材料, 既可以用铝也可以用钢.

sentences.en: During the launch phase, it would ride in a protective aluminum shell.
sentences.cn: 在发射阶段, 它盛在一只保护的铝壳里.

sentences.en: He gave me an aluminum putter that I use to - day. "
sentences.cn: 他送了我一根打高尔夫球的轻击棒,我到今天还在用. ”

sentences.en: He had a house there and a dock and a little aluminum boat.
sentences.cn: 他在那儿有一所房子、一个泊船的码头和一艘小铝船。

sentences.en: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.cn: 他认为不仅砷属于在磷下面，我预言还有一个元素,是在铝之上和铟的下边的。

sentences.en: Iron and aluminum compounds precipitate as a voluminous sludge.
sentences.cn: 铁和铝的化合物成为一种体积庞大的蓬松的游渣沉淀下来.

sentences.en: Residual amounts of iron and aluminum dilute the phosphate content.
sentences.cn: 残采的铁铝降低了磷矿的含量.

sentences.en: Selenium and aluminum are found in vanishingly small concentrations within living things.
sentences.cn: 硒和铝在生物中含量其微.

sentences.en: The aluminum sheets cannot be too much thicker than 0.04 inches.
sentences.cn: 铝板厚度不能超过0.04英寸.

sentences.en: The metals most frequently cast are iron, steal, aluminum and so on.
sentences.cn: 最常用来铸造的金属是铁 、 钢 、 铝等.

sentences.en: Their removal is effected by aluminum and ferric salts.
sentences.cn: 用铁盐和铝盐能将其有效地除去.

sentences.en: There are large amounts of aluminum silicate in the area.
sentences.cn: 这个地区有大量的硅酸铝。

sentences.en: These cooking utensils are made of aluminum.
sentences.cn: 这些炊具是铝制的.

sentences.en: To make an aluminum can, that takes energy.
sentences.cn: 为了制造一个铝罐，就得消耗能源。

sentences.en: Today, the uses of aluminum are innumerable.
sentences.cn: 今天铝的用途多得不可胜数.

sentences.en: We take all our aluminum cans for recycling.
sentences.cn: 我们将所有的铝罐回收再利用。

phrases.tran_cn: 挤压铝制品；铝挤压件；喷铝配件
